body:
Unclear if this is in 3-1-stable branch. 

Getting these messages during RUBYOPTS="-W0" rake test:

 ...WARNING: Global access to Rake DSL methods is deprecated.  Please include
    ...  Rake::DSL into classes and modules which use the Rake DSL methods.
WARNING: DSL method Class#task called at /Users/whitemac/source/rails/railties/tmp/app/config/application.rb:48:in `block in <class:Application>'
..WARNING: Global access to Rake DSL methods is deprecated.  Please include
    ...  Rake::DSL into classes and modules which use the Rake DSL methods.
WARNING: DSL method Class#task called at /Users/whitemac/source/rails/railties/tmp/app/config/application.rb:44:in `block in <class:Application>'**
